summary: A dedicated war photographer joins a beautiful Eurasian girl on a dangerous quest for her legacy.
cast: David Hasselhoff|Donita Rose|Rod Steiger|Corin Nemec|Douglas O'Keeffe|Victoria Pratt|Chin Chin Gutierrez|Junix Inocian|Benson Ventura|Naess Verano|Gary Lim|Richard Joson|Mon Confiado|Michele Rogers|Cary Kwasizur|Loni Rose Ann Roxas|Carline Sapp|Joseph Burchell|Leon Miguel|Leo Gamboa|Pen Medina|Joseph Bernal|Mar Garchitorena|Neil Morrison|Richard King|Mario Fernandez|Minco Fabregas|John Espenaz|Mario Mista|Jerry O'Hara|Ronald Alba|Nido De Jesus|Freddie De La Pena|Ronnie Francisco|Atoy Frias|Edwin Herrera|Lito Martinez|Roy Serrano|Nonong Talbo|Edgar Tedera|Tony Ting
title: Legado mortal
